articles.title: The brightest recorded supernova in history - The KXAN 36 News
articles.content:
Scientists at Birmingham University in the UK have recorded the brightest supernova in history, as reported in an article published in the journal Nature Astronomy.
Astronomers believe that a supernova SN2016aps may be the model of pulsating pair-instability… [+1034 chars]

articles.title: A Pink Super Moon Will Cover Australia Tonight! - Hit 107
articles.description: We may be confined to our homes right now, but you know what is still here to amaze us: the night’s sky!
articles.content:
We may be confined to our homes right now, but you know what is still here to amaze us: the nights sky!
Lucky for us, this April 8th marks the phenomenon of a Pink Super Moon!
